chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
It arrived with an 87% battery. Considering I paid 700€ for a device in 'excellent' condition, it doesn't meet my expectations. I haven't even removed the security seals. I trusted the seller because most people received their phones with a 100% healthy battery. I've just been unlucky. Therefore, I want to exercise my right of withdrawal and request a refund.

Thank you,

Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
Return status. I used the right of withdrawal to return the mobile phone. I would like to know how I can track the return. Thank you
Thank you,

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

We have been informed that the customer's parcel has been received today, 05/05/2024. Please confirm receipt of the parcel.

Please note that the refund period is 2 days. If there is no response before 08/05/2024, we will refund the customer.

If there is a problem preventing you from resolving this situation, please let us know as soon as possible.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Carelle Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the 2 day deadline for the refund. 

Regards,
TB

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 708,83 € to the customer because the time promised for it has ended and we sent a reminder on 05/06/2024.

Kind regards,
Sara from Back Market
